remarks: The subword of a concatenation of two words within the second of the concatenated words.  (Contributed by AV, 31-May-2018.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro/AV, 21-Oct-2018.)
statement:
swrdccatind.l $e |- ( ph -> ( # ` A ) = L ) $.
swrdccatind.w $e |- ( ph -> ( A e. Word V /\ B e. Word V ) ) $.
swrdccatin2d.1 $e |- ( ph -> M e. ( L ... N ) ) $.
swrdccatin2d.2 $e |- ( ph -> N e. ( L ... ( L + ( # ` B ) ) ) ) $.
swrdccatin2d $p |- ( ph -> ( ( A ++ B ) substr <. M , N >. ) = ( B substr <. ( M - L ) , ( N - L ) >. ) ) $.
